mapper.select:
SELECT a.staySeq, a.stayName, a.stayZipCode, a.stayAddress, a.stayAddressDetail, a.stayLatitude, a.stayHardness, a.stayIntroMemo, a.stayServiceMemo, a.stayNoticeMemo, a.regDateTime, a.modDateTime, a.regionCd, a.activeCd, a.member_memSeq, a.stDeNy, a.stayPrice,
region.ifcdSeq AS regionCd, region.ifcdName AS regionName, active.ifcdSeq AS activeCd, active.ifcdName AS activeName, b.path,
IFNULL(AVG(review.starScore), 0) AS averageRating
FROM stay a LEFT JOIN code region ON a.regionCd = region.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN code active ON a.activeCd = active.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN uploaded AS b ON a.staySeq = b.pSeq AND b.defaultNy = 1 LEFT JOIN review ON a.staySeq = review.stay_staySeq AND review.reDelNy = 0
WHERE 1=1
AND a.regionCd IN
#{region}
AND ( a.stayName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%') OR a.stayAddress LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%') )
AND a.stayName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
AND a.futsalRegion = ( CASE WHEN #{shValue} = '서울' THEN 16 WHEN #{shValue} = '인천' THEN 17 WHEN #{shValue} = '대전' THEN 18 WHEN #{shValue} = '대구' THEN 19 WHEN #{shValue} = '광주' THEN 20 WHEN #{shValue} = '울산' THEN 21 WHEN #{shValue} = '부산' THEN 22 ELSE -1 END )
AND a.stDeNy = 0
GROUP BY a.staySeq ORDER BY a.regDateTime DESC LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}

SELECT a.staySeq, a.stayName, a.stayZipCode, a.stayAddress, a.stayAddressDetail, a.stayLatitude, a.stayHardness, a.stayIntroMemo, a.stayServiceMemo, a.stayNoticeMemo, a.regDateTime, a.modDateTime, a.regionCd, a.activeCd, a.member_memSeq, a.stDeNy, a.stayPrice,
region.ifcdSeq AS regionCd, region.ifcdName AS regionName, active.ifcdSeq AS activeCd, active.ifcdName AS activeName, b.path
FROM stay a LEFT JOIN code region ON a.regionCd = region.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN code active ON a.activeCd = active.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN uploaded AS b ON a.staySeq = b.pSeq AND b.defaultNy = 1
WHERE 1=1
AND a.stDeNy = 0

SELECT a.staySeq, a.stayName, a.stayZipCode, a.stayAddress, a.stayAddressDetail, a.stayLatitude, a.stayHardness, a.stayIntroMemo, a.stayServiceMemo, a.stayNoticeMemo, a.regDateTime, a.modDateTime, a.regionCd, a.activeCd, a.member_memSeq, a.stDeNy, a.stayPrice, a.stayPersonnel, region.ifcdSeq AS regionCd, region.ifcdName AS regionName, active.ifcdSeq AS activeCd, active.ifcdName AS activeName, b.memSeq, b.memName, b.memTel FROM stay a
LEFT JOIN code region ON a.regionCd = region.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN code active ON a.activeCd = active.ifcdSeq LEFT JOIN member b ON a.member_memSeq = b.memSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND staySeq = #{staySeq}

SELECT last_insert_id()
mapper.select:
SELECT a.reSeq, a.starScore, a.reTitle, a.reText, a.member_memSeq, a.stay_staySeq, a.regDateTime, a.reDelNy, b.staySeq, b.stayName, c.memSeq, c.memName, c.memId FROM review a JOIN stay b ON a.stay_staySeq = b.staySeq JOIN member c ON a.member_memSeq = c.memSeq WHERE 1=1
AND stay_staySeq = #{staySeq} AND reDelNy = 0 LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE stay_staySeq=#{staySeq} AND reDelNy = 0
SELECT path FROM uploaded WHERE pSeq=#{staySeq} ORDER BY seq DESC
